ca.qc.collegeahuntsic.bibliotheque.util

Class BibliothequeDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Date
      • ca.qc.collegeahuntsic.bibliotheque.util.BibliothequeDate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<Date>

    public class BibliothequeDate
extends Date
    Un objet Date amélioré.
    Author:
    Gilles Bénichou
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BibliothequeDate()
      Allocates a BibliothequeDate object and initializes it so that it represents the time at which it was allocated, measured to the nearest millisecond.
      BibliothequeDate(long date)
      Allocates a BibliothequeDate object and initializes it to represent the specified number of milliseconds since the standard base time known as "the epoch", namely January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT.

      Calcule la date de fin d'une date (le lendemain).
      static Date getStartDate(Date date)
      Calcule la date de début d'une date (la veille).

        public BibliothequeDate(long date)

        See Also:
        System.currentTimeMillis()
